message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $130. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product, but I was thinking it's worth a bit less to me than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. How about we meet halfway at $122.50?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we meet at $118? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
